%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.

state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

WanderMaze

ChasePlayer

ChasePlayer : ChasePlayer

RunAway

RunAway : RunAway

MoveToBase

MoveToBase : MoveToBase

ChasePlayer --> WanderMaze : NoPlayer
